Lena Voita
Blog Publications Talks & Service Teaching & Supervising

I am Elena (Lena) Voita, a Ph.D. student at the University of Edinburgh and University of Amsterdam. I’m very happy to be supervised by Ivan Titov and Rico Sennrich.

I’m a Facebook PhD Fellow (from fall 2020).

Previously, I was a research scientist at Yandex Research and worked closely with the Yandex Translate team. I (still) teach NLP at the Yandex School of Data Analysis.

News

  • 01/2020 I’m awarded Facebook PhD Fellowhip.
  • 01/2020 Giving several talks, including talks at Google Research Berlin, Naver Labs Europe, NLP track at Applied Machine Learning Days at EPFL.
  • 09/2019 To appear at NeurIPS 2019: Sequence Modeling with Unconstrained Generation Order.
  • 08/2019 2 papers accepted to EMNLP 2019!
  • 06/2019 Attending Google NLP summit in Zurich.
  • 05/2019 2 papers accepted to ACL 2019, one is oral!

Last updated March 30, 2020.
